function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Integrating geospatial data and mapping techniques into epidemic models, developing spatiotemporal analysis tools","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhancing data collection and surveillance for asymptomatic cases and environmental factors, refining dynamic transmission models to capture a broader range of transmission scenarios","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide clear guidelines for converting model parameters to practical intervention measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop methods to integrate spatial information into compartmental models","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporate spatiotemporal dynamics into intervention models and strategies","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promoting social distancing and minimizing close contact","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anonymizing or aggregating data, obtaining informed consent","category":"Privacy measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation of model outputs, expert review of findings","category":"Validation and review","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of advanced data collection and analysis techniques, establishment of emergency data collection protocols","category":"Data collection / analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of comprehensive contact tracing systems, improvement of data collection methods","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of real-time data sources, validation of models with ground truth data, collaboration with domain experts","category":"Data collection / analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement systems to track and analyze resident behavior and interactions","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict and early epidemic prevention and control measures","category":"Preventative measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gather and analyze data to verify means of transmission for accurate modeling","category":"Data collection / analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use updated and verified data sources for analysis","category":"Data collection / analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide comprehensive context and limitations of the discussed measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide detailed methodology and limitations of the evaluation","category":"Validation and review","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict adherence to personal protective equipment ppe protocols and regular ensuring comprehensive coverage for disease control and prevention.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop standardized protocols for grid distribution, ensure comprehensive coverage of high-risk areas, and conduct regular assessments of quarantine effectiveness.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of
